about_me:
My name is Guilherme Toso. I'm a data enthusiast, passionate about solving problems and finding innovative solutions to obstacles. My main focus is to develop data products through data science for better business decisions.
I have a bachelor's degree in Physics and since my graduation in 2017, I discovered Data Science, so I started scientific research in this area in 2018 which led me to a master's degree in Computational Intelligence the following year. Over the years, my academic experience, studies and extracurricular projects have provided an improvement in my critical thinking, data analysis and problem-solving skills, as well as cognitive flexibility.
I'm always looking for evolution, both learning and professional. Therefore, I invite you, to know my works!
title: About me
